org.oucs.oxpoints.entities.time
Class OxPointsTimeBasedEntity

java.lang.Object
  org.oucs.oxpoints.entities.time.OxPointsTimeBasedEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<OxPointsEntity>
public class OxPointsTimeBasedEntity
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<OxPointsEntity>

This class represents an OxPointsEntity over time.

OxPointsEntitys are representations of objects from the OxPoints ontology at a specific point in time. In contrast OxPointsTimeBasedEntitys are a representation of an OxPoints object over time.

OxPointsTimeBasedEntitys provide methods to set and change properties that are time based. It also provides an iterator that returns a new OxPointsEntity whenever a property of the object has changed.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Arno Mittelbach
See Also:
OxPointsEntity

Parameters:
